Uses of Class
pythagoras.d.Vector

  • Packages that use Vector 
    Package Description
    pythagoras.d
    The Pythagoras geometry utility classes specialized on double.

    • Uses of Vector in pythagoras.d

      Constructors in pythagoras.d with parameters of type Vector 
      Constructor and Description
      Ray2(Vector origin, Vector direction)
